p:
(1) Active Ingredient. The active principle of this plant is myristicin ( Figure 13(a)).
Nutmeg:
Essential oil (15%), comprising α-pinene, β-pinene, α-terpinene, β-terpinene, myristicin, elemicin ( Figure 13(b)), and safrole ( Figure 13(c))
Fixed oil “nutmeg butter”: 25 to 40%, mainly, myristicin (trimyristin), terpene carbides (sabinene, pinene, limonene), palmitate, stearin, linalool, and geraniol
Mace:
Essential oil: similar to nuts, with more myristicin
